attributes.action: A overhaul of the littering policies. Start a take litter home campaign.
attributes.additional_details: Everyone appreciates clean green outdoor spaces, no one wants to see rubbish on the beaches. It's inexcusable. Environment impact. Now is the time to change bad habits.
attributes.background: Commit to change culture and attitude to littering especially around our coastlines. Since lock down the benefits to the environment are undeniable, let's take the opportunity to smarten ourselves up. Take litter home campaign. Include this in your COVID campaign, it would be easy.

rejection.details:
Increase penalties, enforcement and education to tackle littering & fly tipping:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324488
